title: Bug 5765New Class button in empty workspace should be more supportive
EB: Bug 5765New Class button in empty workspace should be more supportive User feedback:"Confused how to create my first project"We should be more supportive in the UI for this special case since it is afirst time experience with the UI.Therefore when the workbench is empty we should offer to create a new Javaproject.Minimal solution is to show an info dialog that explains that user shouldcreate a project first and offer a button to open the Java project wizard.The same is true for the new package and new interface buttons.
